title: [娱乐]Battle Arena2——战斗竞技场2[1.8]
author: Lioza
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 06:57 编辑 





BattleArenaLogo.jpg (14.01 KB, 下载次数: 23)

下载附件

2015-9-1 16:49 上传






                        战役竞技场2？
Welcome to the new home of Battle Arena. 
The original plugin Dev's discontinued this project and has been picked up by community members familiar with it.
Expect bugs to be squashed, spankin' new features to be added, and new updates to keep coming! 
A new wiki is being setup with tutorials, information, and the likes as well as a brand new website. 
Thank you, - The BattleArena2 team.


这是前面这位大叔的帖子
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-219267-1-1.html
权限及配置游戏方法请在上面帖子里看
和一代并没有什么区别
但是多了一些扩展小游戏
下面是扩展 
ArenaCTF :夺旗ArenaPaintball :彩弹
Arena One in the Chamber:经典OITC游戏
ArenaParkour :经典跑酷与关卡victorypointsArenaSpleef :经典掘一死战
ArenaBowSpleef :掘一死战与弓箭
ArenaFootbal :与其他玩家踢足球
ArenaRailgun :Allows item customization with properties(这个好像比较叼，看样子是炮姐的超电磁炮)
SurvivalArena :生存游戏插件
HostageArena :拯救VIP
BombArena :Sabotage & Search-N-Destroy game-modes(好像是爆破模式)
ArenaBlutonium :一个流行的迷你游戏，装车：收集矿石取胜。
ArenaPlunger  A HoldTheItem minigame mode originaly from ChaosFaction2.(看介绍好像是捡马桶塞的游戏)


这些扩展请在下载地址的下面找.
